section.section:
The Administration may suspend or revoke the registration or certificate of title of any vehicle if the Administration:
Is satisfied that the registration or certificate was fraudulently obtained or erroneously issued;
Determines that the required fee has not been paid after reasonable notice and demand; or
Is so authorized under any other provision of law.

The Administration may suspend or revoke the registration of a vehicle if:
The Administration determines that the vehicle is mechanically unfit or unsafe to be operated on the highways;
The vehicle has been dismantled or wrecked; or
A registration card or registration plate not issued for that vehicle is displayed on or for the vehicle.

text.section:
A suspension or revocation under this section is subject to the right of appeal as follows:
By a resident to the circuit court for the county in which the individual resides or has a principal place of business;
By a nonresident to the circuit court for the county in which the individual temporarily resides or was apprehended; or
In any other case, to the Circuit Court for Anne Arundel County.
